title.narrative: Better Police Readiness in C/bean Law Enforcement

description.narrative: Better Police Readiness in C/bean Law Enforcement Assistance awards made through Bilateral Agreements, Letters of Agreement, including those established under C-175 authority, and Fulbright Commission agreements. transaction.usg:treasury-account: International Narcotics Control and Law Enforcement

title.narrative: Transforming National Responses through Community-based approaches to TIP: a civil society collaborative project

description.narrative: Red Thread is raising awareness of human trafficking in Guyana by developing a coalition of stakeholders to fight trafficking in persons through a national human trafficking awareness communication strategy; enhanced identification and responses to cases of trafficking; and establishment of model communities to minimize push factors related to human trafficking vulnerability.

person-name.narrative: Jenee Sharon; Wes Aviles; Ryan Boles

title.narrative: Enhancing Fisherfolk Participation in Fisheries Management

description.narrative: This project will strengthen the capacity and governance systems of seven artisanal fisherfolk cooperatives in six coastal regions of Guyana to enhance their ability to identify and document IUU fishing and improve fisheries management in Guyana.

title.narrative: Conservation of the 19th-Century Stabroek Market Clock in Georgetown

description.narrative: The iron and steel Stabroek Market is an architectural marvel and industrial landmark. This project involves the conservation of the clock tower and reactivation of the markets signature four face analog clock.
